website_summaries.verdict: While the Cagic 8.4-inch digital photo frame isn't laden with extra features, it gets high marks for design and build-quality.
pros: The photo frame is attractive and well built, with a solid metal back

it has a bright, sharp 8.4-inch display, 1GB SD memory card included, plus slots for virtually all memory card types, as well as a mini USB connection to connect digital cameras, thumbdrives, and computers (an adapter is included)
touch-matting technology for navigating user interface
cons: No extra features, such as Wi-Fi, MP3, or video capability
It's also pricier than similarly sized models

customer_reviews.title: It has plenty of storage and looks great. As far as ease of use
customer_reviews.text: It has plenty of storage and looks great. As far as ease of use... not so much. Rotating photos is such a headache. It takes forever, and sometimes it advances and then flips the wrong photo. We still haven't been able to access the settings menu to switch our preferences. This is supposed to be a gift! We were going to load the pictures to save them the hassle but I still dont even know if I want to send it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grandparents to have lots of photos
customer_reviews.text: We got one for both my mom and my spouses mom. I did the work of putting the photos in it. It was a bit of work but it is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Teeters

customer_reviews.title: works great. Very heavy wood and appears to be solid ...
customer_reviews.text: Ditto to all the other reviews..works great. Very heavy wood and appears to be solid metal backing. Built like it's from the 50s!! Great price. Only con is it doesn't come with a remote for u to lose. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Munsell

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy another Cagic product. Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to get this product to work as advertised. It wouldn't load more than 5 pictures on the device. When I called tech support, the first person I spoke with asked me to call back because their computer was not working properly. The second person (on the same phone number) told me I had the wrong number.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C. Ford

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty but doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in October as a Christmas present for my girlfriend. It worked for one day and never turned back on. I’ve tried resetting it and nothing happens. It looks pretty but doesn’t work. I would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk, have gone through three of them and none work, can't get a refund. Absolutely terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin & Melody

customer_reviews.title: High quality frame, makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, classy looking frame. Easy to use. We have one in our home and get so many compliments. I like to give this item as a gift. I've purchased several of them and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: stacey10S

customer_reviews.title: I purchased one of these back in 2011 that was ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these back in 2011 that was recently destroyed in a flood. This recent purchase was a replacement and performs identically to the first one - no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: John Gatsis

customer_reviews.title: Bought two because they look good...horrible to use.  Terrible to set as settings work about 25% of the time.  Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't hooked it up yet to make sure it works, but it is really nice looking and I am very pleased with the amount of photos that can be utilized. A very nice unit. Later...doesn’t work, no customer service, out of business?
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Thom

customer_reviews.title: No customer service - and unit doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a special occasion to display a lifetime of photos. When I tried to connect the unit to my computer, it stalled out repeatedly. When I called Cagic customer service, it no longer existed. Same re email service. So I have a party in four hours and no digital frame. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: K. P. Wheeler

product_meta.title: Cagic C8-BIRCH 8.4-Inch TFT LCD Digital Picture Frame with TrueVu (Birch Wood)
product_meta.description:
Color:BirchFROM THE MANUFACTURER


What Makes Cagic So Much Better? 

European Styling 
Cagic was designed by a European-trained interior stylist using quality materials and bringing a passionate attention to detail. Unlike other gadgets on the market, Cagic will look gorgeous in any décor and from any angle. It is not a gadget but an element of home décor. Cagic is available in three beautiful frame finishes: mahogany, birch and black. 

Intuitive Touch Matting Interface 
Frame buyers tend to be women and tend to gift to an older audience. They want to enjoy their pictures, not learn (or need to explain) a new gadget. We at Cagic understand this, which is why we created an intuitive touch-matting interface for effortless frame operation. 

Expandable Memory 
Like most other frames, Cagic has multiple slots to accommodate different camera memory cards. In addition, Cagic has an extra SD memory slot that ships with a 2GB SD card inserted. This gives users the convenience of on-board memory with the flexibility to expand the memory available based on their needs. Users who wish to have more on board memory can simply remove the SD card and replace it with a larger one. 

Freedom in Orientation 
Cagic can be placed vertically or horizontally according to the user's preference or mood. The frame will immediately and automatically display pictures correct for however the frame is placed. 

Next Generation Platform 
Cagic is the first frame built on the new generation of image processors, rather than the standard AmLogic or MagicPixel chipset. This allows for more fluid display of photos and faster performance and storage. 

True Touch Matting 
Unlike other frames with glowing buttons, Cagic is the first digital picture frame with true, patent-pending touch matting technology. The use of soft keys in the matting allows for a complete integration of controls into the frame, without interfering with the elegant design of the frame. 
Technical Specifications 

Vivid, luxuriant color screen 
-- LCD: 8.4" Full Color TFT LCD with TrueVu for perfect photos every time 
-- Resolution: High resolution 800x600 Flexibility in storage media 
-- Mini USB connection to connect to a camera, flash drive or a computer 
-- Compatible Memory Cards: CompactFlash (CF), SecureDigital (SD), MMC, MemoryStick, MemoryStick Pro, MemoryStick Duo 
-- Two separate SD card slots: one for storage, one to load photos 

Capacity to hold years of your favorite memories 
-- Storage: Included 2GB SD card holds up to 20,000 photos at 800x600 resolution with CPO5 optimization 
-- Number of photos will vary by resolution 
-- Native JPG format 
-- SD Card can be replaced to increase screen storage capacity 

Beautifully designed and integrated power cord completes the design 
-- Power: 5V 2A 
-- AC: 110V-240V 

The perfect size for your home 
-- Dimensions: 10.1" x 12" x 3.2" 
-- Weight: 4 lbs, 2 oz 

In the box, everything you need to view your pictures in minutes 
-- Cagic Digital Frame with included 2GB SD Card 
-- AC Adapter 
-- Mini USB -> USB Adapter 
-- Quick Start Guide
feature_bullets: 8.4-inch TFT LCD with TrueVu, Solid Birch Wood Frame Construction
Compact Flash (CF), Secure Digital (SD), MMC, xD, Memorystick, MemoryStick Pro, MemoryStick Duo
